data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 2, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Tigres advance rapidly upfield but Diego Montano Robles blows for offside.
In the minute 4, Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 6, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Tigres.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Tigres.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tigres.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 14, Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.

Tigres push upfield but Diego Montano Robles quickly pulls them for offside.

Jonathan Rodriguez of Cruz Azul gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.

Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tigres.

Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.

In the minute 29, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Juan Escobar is on target to give Cruz Azul a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 30, That's a fine assist from Roberto Alvarado.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul's Ignacio Rivero breaks free at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the strike goes wide of the post.

Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles awards Tigres a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Guido Pizarro equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Tigres's half.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
